snippet.title: Nexus 1.9 Update: Faction Boosts!
snippet.description:
Discord: https://discord.gg/cardania
Web3 Connect: https://nexus.cardania.com
Mint Starships: https://nexus.cardania.com/starships

Menu overhaul: Leaderboard now in the Epoch Wars menu under "Factions & Leaders"

Faction Boosts: faction members may boost their entire cohort each epoch with three faction-wide boosts, "Blessing", "Bloodlust", and "Reinforcement". Boosts have an associated RAD and Quantum Dark Energy cost.

Faction Balance Incentives: factions with smaller populations will receive substantial XP Bonuses and BONUS RAD acquired from battle. factions with overbalanced populations will receive comparatively less XP and less RAD from battle.

Faction re-alignment:  Players may choose re-align factions once per epoch. Additional re-alignment has an associated RAD cost.

Other small improvements and bugfixes!
